LANDING.HERO_PARAGRAPH_1: Front-End Developer specializing in Angular and enthusiastic about video game development
LANDING.HERO_PARAGRAPH_2: Although I have many other skills...
LANDING.SUBHEADER: But you can call me Mike

PANEL_1.PARAGRAPH_1: My name is Miguel Ángel Hernández Jiménez, and I am a Software Developer specialized in the MEAN stack. I am passionate about building efficient, scalable solutions with a strong focus on user experience.
PANEL_1.PARAGRAPH_2: I consider myself a disciplined, persistent, and results-driven professional. When I set an objective, I commit fully until it is completed. I prefer taking the necessary time to deliver high-quality work rather than choosing shortcuts that compromise the outcome.
PANEL_1.PARAGRAPH_3: I don’t claim to know everything, but I do have a skill I value highly: the ability to learn continuously. This mindset has allowed me to overcome complex challenges and adapt quickly to new technologies. As long as I can learn, I am capable of solving any problem that comes my way.

PANEL_2.HEADER: What technologies do I work with?
PANEL_2.PARAGRAPH_1: Throughout my professional journey, I have worked with a wide range of technologies, with my strongest experience in Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. These tools form the foundation of my expertise in building modern, high-performance applications.
PANEL_2.PARAGRAPH_2: During my university studies, I learned the fundamentals of object-oriented programming using Java, and had the opportunity to practice and experiment with C++. I also gained basic experience with SQL Server, which helped me understand the core concepts of relational databases.
PANEL_2.PARAGRAPH_3: I am currently expanding my skill set into the Python ecosystem by learning Django, aiming to strengthen my Back-End development capabilities and further diversify my technical profile.

PANEL_3.PARAGRAPH_1: My main hobbies include music and video games, although I also enjoy building computers, cooking, and driving. I consider myself a curious person who loves learning and trying new activities.
PANEL_3.PARAGRAPH_2: As a musician, I play guitar, bass, and drums, and I occasionally experiment with writing my own songs. Music has been a meaningful part of my life, helping me develop discipline, creativity, and teamwork skills.
PANEL_3.PARAGRAPH_3: My musical taste revolves mainly around Alternative Rock, Metalcore, Thrash Metal, and Nu Metal. Still, I also enjoy genres like pop, hip-hop, and classical music, as I appreciate analyzing different styles and their composition.
PANEL_3.PARAGRAPH_4: I'm naturally competitive, so I particularly enjoy PVP multiplayer games. I love the feeling of improving over time and testing my skills against other players.
PANEL_3.PARAGRAPH_5: I also enjoy adventure games and cooperative horror titles, where teamwork and shared experiences make the gameplay even more enjoyable.
PANEL_3.PARAGRAPH_6: Some of my favorite games include League of Legends, Apex Legends, and PUBG on the competitive side, and REPO, PEAK, and Phasmophobia among cooperative titles.
